name: Orbital Toolkit
description:
Find out the secret mechanisms of an old box in this tile-based puzzle game. Credits Nitai Heeb (OrangeJam)
Coding, Modelling
Nils Wallenfang (nilolo)
Coding, Design
Niels Asselborn
Modelling, 2D Art

Music from freesound by user shortrecord.

The source code is available on Github!

This game was made for Godot Wild Jam 46! We implemented the wildcard Non-Euclidean.
